description.oldValue:
,Today, self-service password reset (SSPR) and footer hyperlinks direct end-users to Microsoft resources. Also, Microsoft logo is rendered in the browser tab. We're introducing the ability to customize them and remove all references to Microsoft.
GA date: May CY2023
Preview date: October CY2022
description.newValue: ,Today, self-service password reset (SSPR) and footer hyperlinks direct end-users to Microsoft resources. Also, Microsoft logo is rendered in the browser tab. We're introducing the ability to customize them and remove all references to Microsoft.
